description: Create 2 random Poros from any region and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Create 2 random Poros from any region and 2 Poro Snax.
flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Aurora Porealis
